website_summaries.verdict: A powerful weed torch that works well for a variety of tasks. Reasonably priced.
pros: This torch reaches 500,000 BTUs, making it well-suited for anything from ice melting to melting asphalt
Compatible with a range of propane tanks
The 10-foot hose allows a good amount of maneuverability
cons: Works best in short bursts, as the flame may dissipate if the trigger is held down

customer_reviews.title: Best used with short bursts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design in theory, but I fear that it must have been designed before American propane tanks were nanny-engineered. It works as advertised for short bursts, but there is a design feature on modern American tanks trying to idiot proof them. If it is run full on for more than a few seconds a choke valve kicks in and slows the flow back to a trickle. This valve is finicky and sometimes sets off flow restriction and sometimes not. The instructions are helpful at reducing this but won’t eliminate it. Propane companies won’t fill tanks with the old style valves which work all the time so I guess we’re stuck.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! (If you know how to use them)
customer_reviews.text: These weed torches operate just like a blow torch. If you know how to use - no problems. After reading the reviews, I was a little skeptical. SO... Things to know - It fits a standard (non-travel) BBQ Grill tank (20# propane tank). That thread on the inside - Its reverse thread . The torch trigger (lever) should be used like a throttle. Don't just slam it all the way down and off like a switch (the flame will go out) . Press down slowly - enough to get the desired heat. Keeping the torch nozzle low to the ground helps keep it lit (thermal dynamics).

product_meta.title: Flame King YSNPQ-5000T Heavy Duty Propane Torch Weed Burner, Black, Comes with Flint Striker
product_meta.description: The Flame King 5000T Propane Torch Burner is perfect for many differrent uses; melting snow and ice, removing parking lot markings, paint removal, thawing frozen pipes and equipment, melting tar and asphalt, and so much more. It is designed with a molded handle for added control and comfort. The Flame King 5000T Torch comes fully assembled and ready to use. At 500, 000 BTU this is the ultimate torch for your heavy duty jobs. This torch is compatible with standard liquid propane cylinders including; 5lbs, 10lbs, 20lbs, 30lbs, 40lbs and 100lbs propane cylinders. The Flame King 5000T Torch includes a 10' hose rated at 350 PSI, as well as a brass ajusting valve to control the flame. Package includes a flint striker for lighting the torch. Propane cylinder not included.
feature_bullets: HIGH INTENSITY TORCH FOR MAX HEAT - 500, 000 BTU propane torch for max heat output
GRIP EASY HANDLE - Molded handle for additional control and comfort
LONG REACH HOSE - 10 foot hose rated at 350 PSI is great for hard to reach areas without carrying propane tank
MULTI PURPOSE - Weed Burning Roof Asphalt Melting, Soldering, Snow Melting, Paint Removal, Wood Fire Starting, and Searing
USE ALL AROUND THE HOUSE AND SHOP: Ideal for home, garden, farm, industrial and construction use
POL SAFETY VALVE - Reverse thread POL safety valve (righty loosey, lefty tighty). Contains internal safety mechanisms that restricts 95% of propane flow in case of a leak.
